attributes.action: Resignation of all MPs for failing the Public.
attributes.background: This petition is to get the Members of Parliament across all parties to accept responsibility in not upholding the democratic result of the referendum to leave the European Union, this petition is asking for their resignations and to hold them all accountable.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for each individual MP and not the Government or Parliament. You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
